channel.title: Hello Moparscape
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape.
Its been a long time coming that I've made an account here. "I have heard so many wonderful things about this community. So I felt it necessary to become a part of its success" :D
ha :)
I hope to learn a few things from you, and enjoy the games we all once loved.
Andy

[/quote]you were on fc :p[/quote]

item.title: Hello Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:45, topic:444181”]Almost forgot
List for what makes the best kind of server (krackkid :rolleyes:)

[code]0. Custom Items

  1. Spawn everything
  2. Donators can spawn overpowered items
  3. Abusing admins
  4. Abusing mods
  5. Dupes
  6. Lag
  7. leeched
  8. Retarded community
  9. Servers that even forget to change the name
  10. Racist people
  11. Server must have uberprosuperawesome and the letter x in its name
  12. All the shops in 1 building like the party room.
  13. Prefect ring
  14. Monsters with less HP then needed
  15. More staff then players
  16. get moderator and admin powers by begging like a bitch
  17. Owners must use ::hail more than 8 times within an hour
  18. You can buy co-ownership for 15 bucks.
  19. Server has to restart every 30 minutes.
  20. Owner must use ::god to be super cool
  21. forums is half-assed and looks like shit
  22. random message every 15mins making u vote
  23. thieving stalls, and ores are around the corner of home.
  24. home is edge.
  25. owners yell tag is “BEST CODER IN THE WORLD:”
  26. every1 can yell.
  27. Equivalent economy to present day america’s.
  28. NPCs shout the name of the owner.
  29. ::skill1 ::skill2 ::skill3 to train skills.
  30. ::train ::train2 ::train3 to train combat.
  31. Every time you login a window pops up with the zillion commands you can use.
  32. noclip.
  33. owners name always contains the word “owner”
  34. the “coders” act all big
  35. name starts with “scape”
  36. Coowner has access to the VPS
  37. .tk domain
  38. Advertise on every forum and every board in the forums
  39. Advertise on runescape
  40. Make a facebook page for it
  41. make twitter page.
  42. Get mod to get 5 players.
  43. Or get stuff when you advertise.
  44. Free rares for first 5 people on
  45. Drop party everytime the server gets 20 people online
  46. Servers that use mybannermaker.com for banners
  47. In the description of their server, they put ‘working DClaws’ 3 different times.
  48. Server in which have a vote command because they can’t get people to vote normally.
  49. Servers with custom log in messages that look horrible
  50. Servers with mage that doesn’t require level or runes
  51. Servers with no need for arrows with bows
  52. Banners are always a pic of some type of weapon spec.
  53. Advertisements have around 50 pictures of random shit or useless features
  54. Pictures of real runescape used for advertisement
  55. Servers that make you manually save
  56. Servers that say they are #1 server in the world even though they are ranked 800+ on a toplist
  57. Servers that say they are using vps but using home internet.
  58. PI.
  59. Dildos as swords, That can be use to probe cows(Cj would get the joke)
  60. People who call their server, their own “game”
  61. Owners never even heard of Java.
  62. Owners are 13 year olds who can’t even spell or type a sentence with no errors
  63. Owners who threaten to RAT you because you correct them on their grammar mistakes
  64. Owners don’t have any protection and get ddosed by the members who demand staff…
  65. Community is full of members who demand staff.
  66. everybody has all 99s in a week or a day.
  67. nobody pks when the adverts say “pking 24/7, best pking”
  68. Server never updates with new content
  69. All skills go over 99.
  70. ::players command with the old same ass message-.-
  71. Servers that claim “24/7 for years to come” and disappear after a week.
  72. Firecape minigames that have over 9000 waves
  73. Coins to buy from the tzhaar shops instead of Tokkul
  74. And don’t get me started on trading sticks
  75. Command based Grand Exchange that uses deposit boxes
  76. Server is easy to hack with cheat engines.
  77. Owner phishing your info.
  78. Owner is a pedophile.
  79. You get banned right after donating.
  80. False Donator privileges.
  81. Server allows up to 8k users per ip (easy server DC if you have a login bot)
  82. The banner says they have something but they say there working on it when there not and there just using it to advertise.
  83. Hybrid pvp, hybrid pvp v2, hybrid pvp v3
  84. owner uses his shitty computer and claims it to be a 20 gb ram
  85. auto clicking theif stalls that give you 1m each
  86. Eco runs off a item like party hats and santa’s.
  87. Erasedpkz summoning
  88. server has anything to do with lordy and his leeching skills.
  89. dungeoneering where you can click npcs on the other side of the wall and you noclip through them.
  90. people pretend to be chicks
  91. people who are chicks but wont show
  92. people who think they are the shit
  93. people who donate then think they are better than everybody else
  94. servers that promises cookies upon joining and you never get
  95. Using smffy, smfforfree, etc To make a forum.
  96. Using anything but SMF, IPB, or VB for a forum LOL
  97. Giving away free donor to the first three players
  98. Doing ::pnpc for no dam reason
  99. Haters who ban people when you tell the truth about how crappy their server is
  100. Servers that have the really long time to log in
  101. Servers that still use silab client
  102. When food isn’t in a shop
  103. When food is in a shop but its not noted
  104. When food isn’t in a shop but people sell for like 1m each
  105. When admins pk on there admins account and use the yell command to try and ridicule you about teleing/running when they can spawn…?
  106. When i get a deja vu when seeing a server
  107. Owner kills their players so they lose stuff because it’s “funny”.
  108. Owner doesn’t know the difference between hard drive space and RAM
  109. Owner uses donation money for action figures
  110. Players who pretend to be sluttly girls
  111. Owner hosts off his Ipad[/code][/quote]
    Lmao kinda embarrassing because a few of those match me.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:40, topic:444181”]Don’t bring up the suicide on here, the whole altercation occurred at another site, so some don’t know the truth.
@OP: Welcome to Moparscape.[/quote]Unless the truth means that it didn’t happen, it doesn’t matter. It’s completely fake.
